ValidationRule.description: BODEV-1013: Temporary validation rule to prevent Mid-Market being selected in Company Size New field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Company_Size_New__c ) ), ISPICKVAL( Company_Size_New__c, "Mid-Market") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mid-Market should not be selected. Please select MM - Small (<= 1,000 FTEs) or MM - Large (> 1,000 FTEs).
